law.text: The department, with the approval of the Finance and Administration Cabinet, shall establish the prices at which all articles or products manufactured or produced shall be furnished.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 60, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 32, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1); and Art. V, sec. 24(14). -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 4.
